title: Is Mercedes doomed this summer? 2025 Emilia-Romagna GP takeaways
summary: Max Verstappen delivered another superb drive to win the 2025 Emilia Romagna GP. Here are the main insights from the Imola weekend

qa_pairs.question: Who won the 2025 Emilia Romagna GP?
What team does Max Verstappen drive for?
What is the significance of the Emilia Romagna GP in the F1 calendar?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is an annual race held in Italy, part of the Formula 1 World Championship.
